roleset.name: watch over
roleset.note: SHEPHERD-V NOTES: Member of Vncls captain-29.8-1, accompany-51.7. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from shepherd.01-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: Producers Don Simpson and Jerry Bruckheimer, who-1 *trace*-1 shepherded ``Flashdance'' through several scripts and ultimately produced the movie, bristle when Messrs. Guber and Peters take credit for the film.
example.arg: who -> Producers Don Simpson and Jerry Bruckheimer
